name: The Red Button
description:
- Man vs The Red Button

You are in front of a red button you must no press.
Will you dare to defy the unknown, or will you walk away, forever wondering what could have been?
Only the strongest will be rewarded and enter the Empty Place.

This game includes:
- A button
- A choice
- A secret place
- 10 ranks to climb.
- 80.6mb of data
- You don't need a mouse, a keyboard or even a screen to play it.
- Voice acting by Shakyra Dunn.
